title: Pezroly
author: Pezroly
content: Download free Libre Office and use it instead of expensive Microsoft Word. The same Microsoft Word, but much better. Faster document opening with doc or xls file shortcuts in the main window. Plus you can also save as doc and xls document.For Windows 7 - 11, 32 and 64 bit.Link: https://www.libreoffice.org/
